title: Metamorphosis card
data:
{{obsolete}} The Metamorphosis card applies a random bodily transformation, selected as follows. *Power level 0: [[Spider Form]], [[Ice Form]], or [[Bat Form]]. *Power level 1: [[Statue Form]] or [[Blade Hands]]. *Power level 2: [[Dragon Form]] or [[Necromutation|Lich Form]]. Transformation happens at a random power up to (power / 4) - 1. ==History== This card was removed in [[0.16]].
